thread.title: Jamiroquai To Release First Album In 7 Years, 'Automaton' [News]
thread.title_full: Jamiroquai To Release First Album In 7 Years, 'Automaton' [News]

title: Jamiroquai To Release First Album In 7 Years, 'Automaton' [News]
text:
Jamiroquai to Release First Album in 7 Years, 'Automaton' The video for the title track is already available. UG editor. Music lover. Constant searcher of something interesting and unique. Posted 2 hours ago 9 
Jamiroquai are returning with the "Automaton," their first album in seven years. 
"Automaton" will be released on March 31. The band's previous effort, "Rock Dust Light Star," was released back in 2010. 
Vocalist Jay Kay described the inspiration for "Automaton": 
"In recognition of the rise of artificial intelligence and technology in our world today and how we as humans are beginning to forget the more pleasant, simple and eloquent things in life and in our environment including our relationship with one another as human beings." 
The album's title track is also the first single and its music video can be viewed below:
